Comment: Abilities: A0YV (Soul Release), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: Unleashes spirits stored in Frostmourne to attack nearby enemies, slowing and draining enemy health to replenish Lich King's. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 10 spirits. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 20 spirits. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 30 spirits. |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - 40 spirits. |n|nLasts <A0YV,HeroDur1> seconds.
